title: ABOUT MUNZ
meta: Im a 3D artist and designer focused on CGI VFX and isometric worldbuilding. I create bold visual systems for brands artists and new digital worlds. My work blends realism, style and experimentation

title: Art Direction | Pipeline Building | Project Management
meta: As the lead artist and project manager at Virtuosus, I oversee the full creative pipeline—from concept and design to final CGI, VFX, and interactive experiences. I guide projects end-to-end, balancing artistic direction with clear communication, efficient workflow management, and high-quality delivery. My role combines hands-on visual creation with team coordination to bring ambitious ideas to life smoothly and on schedule.
